thread.title: Undiscovered gem
thread.title_full: Undiscovered gem - Review of Washington Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lawrence S
title: Undiscovered gem
text:
A small hotel, off the beaten track, in Greenwich Village.A very nice experience. Charming place, modest but adequate rooms, very reasonable prices, friendly and helpful staff, nice continental breakfast (free). Excellent restaurant. A few housekeeping glitches: hair pin in room carpet (lack of vacuuming?), dirt encrusted TV remote, torn bathrobe, lack of slippers (supplied in other rooms).
Room Tip: second floor rooms may have street noise. See more room tips
